caption.p: Effects of Artemisia annua floral essential oil on the nodule formation of Glyphodes pyloalis larvae treated with oral ( A) and fumigant assays ( B) and inoculated with Beauveria bassiana spores or latex beads. Bars with different letters indicate significant differences between means at p < 0.05. Tukey’s test. The number of hemocytes ×10 4.
